item.title: Thanks for being part of Litecoin!
item.description:
We at OZCOIN would like to thank everyone for their continued support in Litecoin and using OZCOIN for your mining needs. We have seen pools come and go and we continue to provide the best possible Prop pool around.
Thanks again for being part of OZCOIN.
-Staff

item.title: Individual Hashrate Stats Reset
item.description: During some emergency maintenance we discovered that the stats information was not expiring correctly -- in order to deal with the massive volume of largely useless data we reset state and tuned up the logic a bit to be more robust going forward. We suggest you hash early and often to fill it out again :-)

item.title: Litecoin mining at Ozcoin
item.description:
Hi and welcome to Ozcoins Litecoin mining pool
http://lc.ozco.in:9332
https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=47417.0 for the forum thread and links to miners.
irc.freenode.net #litecoin for irc
